content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) NEW YORK  September 18 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has affirmed and withdrawn the  following ratings for Public Storage: --Issuer Default Rating (IDR) at 'A+'; --Unsecured revolving line of credit at 'A+'; --Preferred stock at 'A'. The Rating Outlook is Stable. Fitch has chosen to withdraw the ratings for Public Storage for commercial  reasons. KEY RATING DRIVERS The 'A+' IDR reflects the company's minimal debt  which results in low leverage
name: Public Storage
title: Fitch Withdraws Public Storage's Ratings
